column3: address him by hid first name  ""SIR""

All that team sky pro crap, not to mention the statment of that idiot who is  not a cyclist, just a university student with an expensive bicycle and rapha cool clothes on.. Sir Wiggins LOL were are you! did not see you mate, a real champion woud go to do il lombardia..  aren't  you  ashamed for shifting  all this  bloody commercial non sense
The greatest ever???  One tour and several olympic medals is really great, but he's nowhere near any of the titans of the sport.
The greatest cyclist who ever lived?  Come on.  I think Eddy Merckx would have something to say about that.
